items.title: Retail's Risky AI Commerce Bet: Data Control and Market Share at Stake
items.title_en: Retail's Risky AI Commerce Bet: Data Control and Market Share at Stake

items.summary_en: Major retailers including Google, Etsy, and Wayfair are facing significant risks of losing data control as they invest heavily in agentic AI commerce. As large tech platforms mediate the shopping experience, retailers risk ceding control of customer data and direct relationships. This shift threatens retailer margins and long-term competitive positioning in an AI-driven commerce landscape.

items.so_what_en: D2C brands must prioritize building proprietary AI shopping experiences or strengthen owned-channel strategies. Rather than relying on platform intermediaries, investing in independent agentic AI technologies that maintain direct customer data control and relationships is essential for long-term competitive survival.
items.body_text: Overview Retail Dive reports on the growing tensions between retailers and technology platforms over agentic commerce implementations. As Google, Etsy, and Wayfair increasingly integrate with large language models and AI shopping assistants, traditional retail players face a critical decision point about data sovereignty. Key Findings The analysis reveals that retailers adopting agentic commerce through third-party platforms are essentially ceding control of customer interactions and data insigh

items.summary_en: commercetools identifies 7 key AI trends reshaping agentic commerce in 2026, including multimodal AI interactions, real-time inventory orchestration, and the maturation of composable commerce architectures. These trends enable retailers to deliver faster, more personalized shopping experiences while fundamentally transforming retail operations. Accelerating adoption of composable architectures allows enterprises to leverage standardized API-based integrations and flexible technology stacks.

items.so_what_en: D2C brands should accelerate transition to composable commerce platforms and adopt API-first architectures to build proprietary agentic AI capabilities. Investing in technology stacks that support multimodal AI interactions (text, image, voice) is essential for competitive differentiation in customer experience.
items.body_text: Overview commercetools, a leading composable commerce platform, outlines the transformation underway in agentic commerce. The report synthesizes market observations and platform capabilities to identify the seven trends most likely to define commerce technology in 2026. The 7 Trends Multimodal Agent Interactions : AI shopping agents now seamlessly handle text queries, image searches, voice commands, and video contentâ€”enabling customers to shop the way that feels natural to them. Real-time Invent

items.title: AI Shopping Tools Gain Traction, But Retailer Pushback Could Cloud 2026 Progress

items.summary_en: eMarketer's latest analysis reveals that while AI shopping tools are gaining consumer traction, retailer pushback threatens to slow market growth. Concerns about data ownership, margin compression, and loss of customer relationship control are delaying adoption among traditional retailers. 2026 market growth may fall short of earlier predictions, with technology integration and regulatory challenges emerging as key bottlenecks.

items.so_what_en: D2C brands should view retailer hesitancy as an opportunity to gain first-mover advantage in proprietary agentic technology. With consumers craving AI-powered shopping experiences while traditional retailers lag, innovative D2C players can capture market share and customer loyalty during this transition window.
items.body_text: Overview eMarketer's research team conducted interviews with 200+ retail executives across North America and Europe to assess current agentic commerce adoption and sentiment. The findings reveal a significant gap between consumer readiness and retail willingness to adopt AI shopping agents. Consumer Adoption vs. Retailer Hesitation On the consumer side, the data is unambiguous: 67% of surveyed online shoppers say they would be "very likely" or "likely" to use an AI shoppi

items.title: Agentic Commerce is the New Front Door to Retail
items.title_en: Agentic Commerce is the New Front Door to Retail

items.summary_en: Microsoft positions agentic commerce as the new paradigm for retail entry points, showcasing real-world Copilot-powered shopping experiences already in deployment. Traditional search and category browsing are being replaced by natural language-based agent interactions that intuitively help customers discover products. An integrated shopping experience across Microsoft's ecosystem (Bing, Edge, Copilot) is emerging as the new retail standard.
items.so_what_ko: D2C ë¸Œëœë“œë“¤ì€ Microsoftì˜ ê´‘ê³  ë„¤íŠ¸ì›Œí¬(Microsoft Ads, Bing Ads)ì™€ Copilot ìƒíƒœê³„ì™€ì˜ í†µí•©ì„ ìš°ì„ ìˆœìœ„ë¡œ í•´ì•¼ í•œë‹¤. ë˜í•œ ë¸Œëœë“œì˜ ì œí’ˆ ì •ë³´ë¥¼ Microsoftì˜ ì—ì´ì „íŠ¸ ì‹œìŠ¤í…œì´ ì‰½ê²Œ ì´í•´í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆë„ë¡ êµ¬ì¡°í™”ëœ ë°ì´í„°(schema)ë¥¼ ìµœì í™”í•´ì•¼ í•œë‹¤.
items.so_what_en: D2C brands should prioritize integration with Microsoft's advertising network (Microsoft Ads, Bing Ads) and Copilot ecosystem. Additionally, optimize structured product data (schema) to ensure Microsoft's agentic systems can easily understand and recommend your products in natural language interactions.
items.body_text: Overview Microsoft's retail industry blog announces a fundamental shift in how customers discover and purchase products online. Rather than typing queries into search boxes or browsing category hierarchies, customers increasingly interact with natural language shopping agents powered by large language models and Copilot technology. The Paradigm Shift The "front door to retail" traditionally has been search engines (Google) or marketplace homepages (Amazon). Microsoft argues that ag

items.title_en: 8 Marketing Automation Trends: AI, Privacy & Personalization

items.summary_en: Klaviyo identifies 8 critical trends in marketing automation for 2026, centering on AI-driven personalization, privacy compliance, and zero-party data activation. Advanced segmentation (behavioral and predictive) and real-time personalization are becoming standard, while regulatory compliance automation (GDPR, CCPA) is emerging as a competitive differentiator. Predictive analytics for lifetime value optimization is becoming essential to customer retention strategies.
items.so_what_ko: D2C ë¸Œëœë“œë“¤ì€ Klaviyo, Segment, ë˜ëŠ” ìœ ì‚¬í•œ ë§ˆì¼€íŒ… ìë™í™” í”Œë«í¼ìœ¼ë¡œì˜ íˆ¬ìë¥¼ ì¦‰ì‹œ ì‹œì‘í•´ì•¼ í•œë‹¤. íŠ¹íˆ í–‰ë™ ê¸°ë°˜ ì„¸ë¶„í™”(behavioral segmentation)ì™€ ì˜ˆì¸¡ ë¶„ì„(predictive analytics) ê¸°ëŠ¥ì„ í™œìš©í•˜ì—¬ ê³ ê° ìƒëª…ì£¼ê¸° ê°€ì¹˜ë¥¼ ë†’ì´ëŠ” ë° ì§‘ì¤‘í•´ì•¼ í•œë‹¤.
items.so_what_en: D2C brands must immediately invest in advanced marketing automation platforms (Klaviyo, Segment, etc.). Focus on leveraging behavioral segmentation and predictive analytics capabilities to maximize customer lifetime value and reduce dependency on paid acquisition channels.
items.body_text: Overview Klaviyo, a leading marketing automation platform for e-commerce and D2C brands, publishes its annual trends report analyzing the state of customer marketing technology. The 2026 report reflects significant maturation in marketing automation capabilities, driven primarily by AI and privacy regulation. The 8 Key Trends Predictive Personalization at Scale : AI-powered models can now predict customer behavior (churn risk, purchase propensity, lifetime value) and automatically personalize me

items.title_en: 9 Marketing Predictions for 2026 as AI Fuels Polarity

items.summary_en: Marketing Dive forecasts that 2026 will be characterized by AI-driven polarity in marketing performance. The gap between AI-effective companies and laggards will widen dramatically, with competitive advantage determined in personalization, content generation, and customer segmentation. Regulatory tightening and privacy requirements will fundamentally reshape how data-driven marketing operates.
items.so_what_ko: D2C ë§ˆì¼€íŒ…íŒ€ë“¤ì€ AI ê¸°ë°˜ ê°œì¸í™” í”Œë«í¼(ì˜ˆ: Klaviyo, Segment)ì— ëŒ€í•œ íˆ¬ìë¥¼ ê°€ì†í™”í•´ì•¼ í•œë‹¤. ë™ì‹œì— ì œë¡œíŒŒí‹° ë°ì´í„°(ê³ ê°ì´ ìë°œì ìœ¼ë¡œ ì œê³µí•œ ë°ì´í„°) ìˆ˜ì§‘ ì „ëµì„ ê°œë°œí•˜ì—¬ ê·œì œ í™˜ê²½ ë³€í™”ì— ëŒ€ë¹„í•´ì•¼ í•œë‹¤.
items.so_what_en: D2C marketing teams must accelerate investment in AI-driven personalization platforms (e.g., Klaviyo, Segment) to maintain competitive parity. Simultaneously, develop zero-party data collection strategies to prepare for evolving regulatory requirements and build customer trust through transparent data practices.
items.body_text: Overview Marketing Dive convened a panel of industry experts to forecast major marketing trends for 2026. The consensus view: artificial intelligence will be the primary driver of market dynamics, but not uniformly. Instead, AI adoption will create a bifurcated market where winners pull further ahead and laggards fall further behind. The 9 Predictions Personalization Becomes Non-Negotiable : Brands not delivering AI-powered personalization will struggle to compete. Consumers now expect individua

items.title: Criteo Launches Agentic Commerce Recommendation Service for AI Shopping Assistants
items.title_en: Criteo Launches Agentic Commerce Recommendation Service for AI Shopping Assistants

items.summary_en: Criteo introduces a new Agentic Commerce Recommendation Service designed to power AI shopping assistants with personalized product recommendations. The service leverages proprietary machine learning models and enables developers to integrate recommendations into their AI agents. This provides retailers and D2C brands with technology infrastructure to build proprietary agents without relying on third-party platforms.

items.so_what_en: D2C brands can leverage third-party APIs like Criteo's recommendation engine to build proprietary agentic technology without platform intermediaries. This enables competitive AI-powered agents while maintaining customer data control and direct relationships.
items.body_text: Overview Criteo, a leading performance marketing and recommendation technology company, announces its entry into the agentic commerce space with a dedicated recommendation service. Rather than building full agentic platforms, Criteo is taking a focused approach: provide the best-in-class recommendation capability that other developers can integrate into their own agents. The Service Details Criteo's Agentic Commerce Recommendation Service offers: Personalized Product Recommendations : Powere

items.title: Google Makes Etsy and Wayfair Items Shoppable Within Agentic AI Search
items.title_en: Google Makes Etsy and Wayfair Items Shoppable Within Agentic AI Search
items.summary_ko: GoogleëŠ” ìì‹ ì˜ ì—ì´ì „íŠ¸ AI ê²€ìƒ‰ ì¸í„°í˜ì´ìŠ¤ ë‚´ì—ì„œ Etsyì™€ Wayfairì˜ ìƒí’ˆì„ ì§ì ‘ êµ¬ë§¤í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆë„ë¡ í†µí•©í–ˆë‹¤. ì´ëŠ” Googleì˜ Universal Commerce Platform(UCP)ì˜ ë˜ ë‹¤ë¥¸ í™•ì¥ìœ¼ë¡œ, ê³ ê°ì´ ê²€ìƒ‰ ê²°ê³¼ í˜ì´ì§€ì—ì„œ ë²—ì–´ë‚˜ì§€ ì•Šê³ ë„ ìƒí’ˆì„ ë°œê²¬í•˜ê³  êµ¬ë§¤í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆë„ë¡ í•œë‹¤. ì´ëŠ” Etsyì™€ Wayfairì—ê²ŒëŠ” ì¶”ê°€ íŠ¸ë˜í”½ì„ ê°€ì ¸ì˜¤ì§€ë§Œ, ê³ ê° ë°ì´í„°ì™€ ê´€ê³„ì—ì„œì˜ í†µì œë ¥ ì†ì‹¤ì€ ë¶ˆê°€í”¼í•˜ë‹¤.
items.summary_en: Google has integrated Etsy and Wayfair products directly into its agentic AI search interface, making items purchasable without leaving the search experience. This expansion of Google's Universal Commerce Platform (UCP) enables customers to discover and buy products while staying within the Google ecosystem. While this drives traffic to Etsy and Wayfair, it furthers their dependence on Google for customer access and data visibility.
items.so_what_ko: D2C ë¸Œëœë“œë“¤ì€ Google UCPì™€ì˜ í†µí•©ì„ ì ê·¹ì ìœ¼ë¡œ ì¶”ì§„í•´ì•¼ í•˜ì§€ë§Œ, ë™ì‹œì— ê³ ê°ì„ ìì‹ ì˜ ì†Œìœ  ì±„ë„ë¡œ ìœ ë„í•˜ëŠ” ì „ëµì„ ë³‘í–‰í•´ì•¼ í•œë‹¤. Googleì„ ì£¼ìš” ê³ ê° ë°œê²¬ ê²½ë¡œë¡œë§Œ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ê³ , ì¬êµ¬ë§¤ì™€ ì¶©ì„±ë„ êµ¬ì¶•ì€ ìì²´ ì±„ë„ì—ì„œ í•´ì•¼ í•œë‹¤.
items.so_what_en: D2C brands should actively pursue Google UCP integration for discoverability, but simultaneously execute a dual strategy to drive repeat customers to owned channels. Use Google as a primary discovery mechanism, but build loyalty and repeat purchase relationships through proprietary channels and email.
items.body_text: Overview Google's latest move in the agentic commerce space signals its determination to become the default shopping interface for the web. By integrating Etsy and Wayfairâ€”two of the largest online retail platformsâ€”directly into its AI search agent, Google makes it possible for customers to browse, compare, and purchase products without ever leaving Google's ecosystem. What This Means Previously, when a customer asked Google's agentic AI for product recommendations, the system might

items.summary_en: At NRF 2026, SAP unveils its vision for embedding AI into the core of retail operations. AI is becoming natively integrated into demand forecasting, inventory optimization, and supply chain planningâ€”enabling retailers to operate more efficiently. New agentic AI capabilities automate decision-making, reducing human intervention and dramatically improving operational efficiency.

items.so_what_en: As D2C brands scale to enterprise systems like SAP and NetSuite, actively leverage embedded AI capabilities for demand forecasting and inventory optimization. These features directly reduce costs and improve customer satisfaction through better stock availability and faster fulfillment.
items.body_text: Overview SAP, one of the world's largest enterprise resource planning software providers, announced at the National Retail Federation (NRF) 2026 conference that AI is now being embedded as a fundamental capability across its retail and supply chain software. Rather than AI being a separate layer or module, it's becoming native to core operational functions. Key AI Capabilities Announced Intelligent Demand Forecasting : AI models that analyze historical sales, seasonal patterns, market tr

items.summary_en: WordStream identifies the biggest AI marketing trends for 2026: proliferation of AI Overviews, the evolution of search optimization into Agentic Engine Optimization (AEO), and large-scale AI-powered content generation. Google's AI Overviews are reducing organic search traffic to publishers, forcing marketing strategies to shift from keyword optimization to content optimized for agentic AI systems. Video, image, and interactive content generation are becoming increasingly automated via AI, dramatically reducing content production costs.

items.so_what_en: D2C marketing teams should gradually shift SEO investment toward AEO (Agentic Engine Optimization). Leverage AI tools (ChatGPT, Claude, Midjourney) to increase content production velocity and reduce costs. Simultaneously, maintain rigorous quality control and brand voice consistency to ensure AI-generated content meets brand standards.
items.body_text: Overview WordStream, a digital marketing software and education platform, synthesizes emerging trends in AI-driven marketing for 2026. The analysis focuses on how search is transforming, how content production is changing, and what marketers must do to stay competitive. The Major Trends 1.
